approaches.title: Boolean operators
approaches.blurb: Use boolean operators to combine the checks.

approaches.title: Multiple clause functions
approaches.blurb: Use multiple clause function to control the order of checks.

approaches.title: Cond
approaches.blurb: Use `cond` to control order of checks.

approaches.title: Case
approaches.blurb: Use `case` and tuples to decide if the year is a leap one.
